pullRequest.title: Fix font issues - Issue #163
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Fix to Issue #163

Consolidation of #213 and #220
Added support to the renderer to display multiple fonts
Added ConstellationLabelFonts interface and integrated it with LabelFontsOptionsPanel to allow developers to programmatically set defaults for fonts rendered on a graph.
Minor refactor to Glyph package structure
Added help
Change the order of the text when the final run ends with a LTR type.
Fix a bug when more than one font texture page is used. The texture coordinate array was being reset on a new page.

Unfortunately some good changes where made by @cygnus-x-1 however are unrelated to issue #163 and have sneaked in. They are good changes so I'd like to let them through this time to avoid @cygnus-x-1 from having to redo this in a separate PR. The requirement for 1 change per PR still stands. These changes include:

Moved icons in modules to a resources sub package
Fixed HTML warnings
Renamed CSS files with a dash

Alternate Designs

Why Should This Be In Core?
The fonts functionality is domain agnostic and already part of Core
Benefits

Fixes #163
Code cleanup and consistency

Possible Drawbacks

Verification Process

Follow steps in https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation/blob/new-fonts/CoreOpenGLDisplay/src/au/gov/asd/tac/constellation/visual/opengl/docs/label-fonts.html
Create a sphere graph with 1000 nodes and check the "All displayable chars" box. Exception before, works after.

Applicable Issues

#163

commit.message: Make GlyphManager switchable.
Move FX code to GlyphManagerFX; add Javadoc to GlyphManager.
Glyphs: new glyph generator (sort of working).
Glyphs: improve render layout; make background work.
Glyphs: add default font; tidy up.
Glyphs: fix glyph scaling.
Glyphs: allow for .otf font files.
Glyphs: clean up; hook up font preferences.
Glyphs: remove extraneous code.
Glyphs: use the font preferences.
Glyphs: make the Apply button work.
Glyphs: display labels in the correct position.
Glyphs: add padding between rectangles in the texture buffer.
Glyphs: cope with text that is too long for the drawing buffer.
Glyphs: look for .otf files in Windows directories.
Glyphs: only use LATIN or COMMON codepoints from the first font.
Glyphs: allow loading of .ttf files; script selection in options.
Glyphs: avoid an exception when a glyph is too tall.
Glyphs: use the correct FontInfo array.
Glyphs: fix drawing bug; use a better default for fonts.
Glyphs: remove obsolete code and comments.
Glyphs: make the label renderer user-selectable.
Glyphs: don't draw a red border in the texture buffer.
Glyphs: draw an oversized background to make indicators work.
